title: Power Finance - Day trading guide: 8 stock recommendations for Tuesday - Economic Times
content: Power Finance - Day trading guide: 8 stock recommendations for Tuesday  Economic Times
description: Buy 120 strike April call option near premium of Rs 3Target: Premium of Rs 7Stop Loss: Premium of Rs 1Post a few days of corrective decline, the stock has gained positive traction. Stability at current levels could lift the stock to the Rs 125-130 zone.Analyst: Amit Trivedi, CMT, Technical Analyst - Institutional Equities, YES Securities Power Finance
